name: net security workflow

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main

env:
  ## Sets environment variable
  PUBLICENV: Available for all jobs in this workflow

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
      - name: Set up JDK 11
        uses: actions/setup-java@v2
        with:
          java-version: 11
          distribution: 'adopt'
      - name: Test with Gradle
        run: ./gradlew clean build
      - name: update ubuntu
        run: sudo apt-get update
      - name: install groovy
        run: sudo apt-get install groovy
      - name: execute groovy sample script
        run: groovy .github/workflows/scripts/sample.groovy
      - name: build
        run: echo "Building project"

  deployDev:
    name: Deploy to Dev
    if: github.event.ref == 'refs/heads/main'
    needs: build
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment:
      name: dev
      url: https://test.com
    steps:
      - name: Deploy
        run: echo "Deploying to dev $env.name"
